allocationDirection.description: The direction of the requested BW allocation: 00 = Downlink (towards the UE) 01 = Uplink (towards the application/session) 10 = Symmetrical

fixedAllocation.description: Size of requested fixed BW allocation in [bps]

fixedBWPriority.description: Indicates the allocation priority when dealing with several applications or sessions in parallel. Values are not defined in the present document

requestType.description: Numeric value (0 - 255) corresponding to specific type of consumer as following: 0 = APPLICATION_SPECIFIC_BW_ALLOCATION 1 = SESSION_SPECIFIC_BW_ALLOCATION

sessionFilter.description: Session filtering criteria, applicable when requestType is set as SESSION_SPECIFIC_BW_ALLOCATION. Any filtering criteria shall define a single session only. In case multiple sessions match sessionFilter the request shall be rejected

dstAddress.description: Destination address identity of session (including range)

sourceIp.description: Source address identity of session (including range)

timeStamp.description: Time stamp to indicate when the corresponding information elements are sent

nanoSeconds.description: The nanoseconds part of the Time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC

seconds.description: The seconds part of the Time. Time is defined as Unixtime since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC
